assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Compucom Software Limited operates as a software and education company in India and the United States. It operates through Software Development, Wind Power Generation, and Learning Solutions segments. The company offers IT services, such as enterprise application development, customer relationship management, business process management, supply chain management, and customized learning solutions; as well as grievance redressal systems and mobile solutions. It also provides ICT-enabled education service for computer education, computer literacy, and computer-aided learning projects in government schools, as well as undertakes e-governance projects. In addition, the company provides software design and development; electronic media; IT and media training, and learning; testing and maintenance; and customer support services. Further, it operates JAN TV, a satellite TV channel that provides education, news, employment, skill development, agriculture, tourism, healthcare, religious, sports, entertainment, and current affairs based programs. It also operates wind power generation plants with a total power generation capacity of 3.2 MW. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Jaipur, India.
